channel.title: Land
channel.description:
So Enderlove hasn't logged in awhile, and I want his land.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2djqo11.png[/img]
Here is a picture.
Enderlove, if you don't reply, I'm going to take your land. Mods, when is the nearest time I can jack his land? He's rarely on and it's a good plot.

item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Shit. Can be locked.

Read full topic

item.title: Land
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:10, topic:438991”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=541693.msg3971072#msg3971072 date=1334162649]
Is this on world 2? If so, I thought there was no concept of land ownership…
[/quote]

arent you the one who kept trying to keep people off his land?[/quote]
Yes, which is why I’m confused that everyone is now suddenly concerned about land ownership whereas I was told to fuck off and play nicely.

Read full topic

item.title: Land
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

He set up a perimeter months ago that says ‘enderlove’s land don’t build’, but there is only 1 more private chest to expire. He still hasn’t answered my PM, so far It’s been 4 days. I have another plot of land closer to civilization but I’d rather keep this thing in an unpopulated region of the map.

Read full topic

item.title: Land
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:10, topic:438991”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=541693.msg3971072#msg3971072 date=1334162649]
Is this on world 2? If so, I thought there was no concept of land ownership…
[/quote]

arent you the one who kept trying to keep people off his land?[/quote]

yeah, and the reason he couldn’t was because of something like what he spoke of, lol.

I don’t see a problem building on someones land, as long as they don’t have plans with it in the near future or have already started to build on it. That’s why when i have plans for land, ill usually build a base of what i want there so no one will build on it.

If those chests are his, wait for lwc to run out of time, then loot his items and build your house on the land (being that nothing will be there anymore).

Read full topic

item.title: Land
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:3, topic:438991”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=541693.msg3968942#msg3968942 date=1333992581]
Good land or not, don’t take the land without his permission. PM him on the forums about it and i’m sure he’ll get back to you eventually.
[/quote]

Well I mean he’d probably reply and say “no it’s mine” even though he might not use it for months.[/quote]

my thoughts exactly. you cant just ask someone for land, lol.

Read full topic
